manpage.title: isalpha iswalpha

description.para: Returns true if c is an alphabetic character (a letter). If islower or isupper is true of a character, then isalpha iswalpha becomes true too.

return.para: If c is within the ranges, then the function returns a non-zero value (A - Z or a - z). This routine returns 0 if c does not satisfy the test condition.

manpage.result: the character is an alphabetic letter !
